dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3762061N] Abuse report for printingequipmentzone.info
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, April 06, 2007 5:19 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3762061N] Abuse report for
printingequipmentzone.info

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Abuse report for printingequipmentzone.info

From: "Jason M Hogle" <jason@jasonhogle.com> 
To: <abuse@theplanet.com> 
Subject: Abuse report for printingequipmentzone.info

        charset="us-ascii"

Content-Language: en-us 
X-AntiAbuse: This header was added to track abuse, please include it
with any abuse report 
X-AntiAbuse: Primary Hostname - oberon.xiberon.net 
X-AntiAbuse: Original Domain - theplanet.com 
X-AntiAbuse: Originator/Caller UID/GID - [47 12] / [47 12]

X-Source-Args:  
X-Source-Dir:  
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 05 Apr 2007 18:21:13.0355 (UTC)
FILETIME=[314E5DB0:01C777AF] 

MIME element (text/plain) 
The site www.printingequipmentzone.info is illegally hosting copyrighted

text and image content from my site 
(http://www.xenogere.com/2007/03/09/if-only-you-were-this-good-looking/)
on 
their site (http://www.printingequipmentzone.info/Reading.htm). 
 
This is copyright infringement as noted below my content on their page 
(taken via my RSS feed with the notice intact). 
 
Please take whatever action is necessary to stop this criminal activity.

 
Thank you in advance for your immediate attention to this serious
matter. 
 
Respectfully, 
 
Jason M Hogle 
http://www.xenogere.com 
jason@xenogere.com
